title: Apple eMac Cleaning and Test Boot (ft.  Hugh Jeffreys) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Apple eMac Cleaning and Test Boot (ft. Hugh Jeffreys) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: The eMac was Apples final CRT Macintosh. However, Krazy Ken accidentally recycled his, so Hugh Jeffreys swings in to save the day! Will it work? Will it have a spider in it?! Lets find out  Special thanks to Linode for sponsoring this video! Fulfill your cloud computing needs, and sign up now (plus save $20 with my code: COMPCLAN20)    Watch Hugh Jeffreys tech channel here!   THANK YOU, HUGH!  Support the show and get in the credits   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures - Apple eMac Cleaning and Test Boot (ft. Hugh Jeffreys)  Pledge on Patreon now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's VIP Discord channel!*   Thanks, Steve, for donating the eMac, and for donating so much more! Check out his eBay store here:   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards  #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
